root.title: Azure Owner Removed From Application or Service Principal
root.description: Identifies when a owner is was removed from a application or service principal in Azure.
root.author: Austin Songer @austinsonger

falsepositives.item: Owner being removed may be performed by a system administrator.
Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment.
Owner removed from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
